dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5763 IH: Main Street Parity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams of Texas (for himself and Ms. Simon) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to modify the criteria for loans for plant acquisition, construction, conversion or expansion, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Main Street Parity Act.

section.header: Modification to criteria for loans for plant acquisition, construction, conversion or expansion

subsection.text: Section 502(3)(C) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 696(3)(C)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by inserting or at the end; and

subsection.text: Section 502(3)(B)(ii) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 696(3)(B)(ii)) is amended by striking clauses (i), (ii), or (iii) of subparagraph (C) and inserting clause (i) of subparagraph (C).
